name: Modern World War Shooter
description:
Get ready for an ultimate fun of destroying base of armed terrorists in Modern World War Shooter for action seeking players in which you experience the most amazing adventure fighting and shooting against dangerous terrorists in battle field environment.

Features:
- First person shooter
- Complex scenes, realistic buildings
- challenging mission
- Addictive game
- Exciting fighting environment
- Simple and smooth operation
- A variety of short-range and long-range weapons
- Real combat effectiveness
